question: How many countries have gini recalculated lower than the world average in 2015?
query: WITH world_average AS (   SELECT AVG(gini_recalculated) AS avg_gini_2015   FROM country_income   WHERE year = 2015 ) SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT country) FROM country_income, world_average WHERE year = 2015 AND gini_recalculated < world_average.avg_gini_2015 LIMIT 50;
